full_description: Use the right arm to grasp the bottle at the target position, lift it up, and perform a vertical shaking motion three times to complete the task.
schema: {A} notifies the bottle, {B} notifies the table, {a} notifies the left arm, {b} notifies the right arm
preference: num of words should not exceed 15. Degree of detail avg is six.
